casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Justin Delane KRAFT No. 448P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 11, 2019 Andrew M. Newman, Attorney at Law, for Kraft, Justin Delane. Rory Agan, Associate Attorney General, James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th of December 2018 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Dissolved by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th of June 2019."

Upon consideration of the petition filed by State of NC on the 20th of December 2018 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th of June 2019."

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 11th of January 2019 by State of NC in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th of June 2019."
